sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"照料，培育"之意。
means: nurse ： 通常指对无力自顾的婴儿、病人等进行照料或护理。
tend ： 指出于责任心、博爱心而不是私人感情去对人或物进行照顾。
foster ： 指对孩子的关心、鼓励、供养及抚养其成长；也指鼓励、促进事物的增长与发展。
cultivate ： 具体意义指耕耘、培育植物；抽象意义指培养兴趣或向往的理想事物。

sentence.Network_en: We tend to meet up for lunch once a week.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们往往每周共进一次午餐。

sentence.Network_en: Older mothers tend to be too idealistic about the pleasures of motherhood.
sentence.Network_cn: 较年长的母亲往往对身为人母的乐趣过于理想化。

sentence.Network_en: I tend to stick to fresh fruit for pudding.
sentence.Network_cn: 我一直坚持用新鲜水果做甜点。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 批发天得(tend)多层式警报灯(图) 广州市铭惠电子有限公司广东广州主营：按钮开关开关指示灯继电器限位开关供应警示灯,警灯.
新概念英语第三册词汇_百度文库 ... suspend vt. 暂停 tend vt. 趋向 attend vi. 照料.
英语构词法（精品） - 豆丁网 ... exist 存在 + tend 倾向 + serve 服务 +.
同等学力英语高频词速记 - 豆丁网 ... attend vt. 出席，参加；看护，照顾 tend vt. 照管，护理 ward n. 保卫；看护；病房；收容所 *.

list.abs: tench 鲤鱼tend on 招待tend shop 招待顾客
纸业专业英语词汇翻译(T2) ... tending 照顾，操作 tending aisle 操作侧，操作面 tending side 操作侧，操作面.
In a new place , they tend to be too shy to make foreign friends ., 而到了一个新地方 , 他们往往太害羞而不去交外国朋友.
“tend”次词的用法？_百度知道 ... tend a grocery 管理一所杂货铺 tend shop 当伙计, 招待顾客 tend upon a customer 招待顾客.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'move or be inclined to move in a certain direction'): from Old French tendre 'stretch, tend', from Latin tendere

entry.def: If something tends to happen, it usually happens or it often happens.

example.ex: A problem for manufacturers is that lighter cars tend to be noisy...
example.tran: 制造商们遇到的一个问题是，重量较轻的汽车往往噪音大。

example.ex: In older age groups women predominate because men tend to die younger...
example.tran: 在老年群体里女性占大多数，因为男性通常不易高寿。

entry.tran: 倾向于，容易表现出(某种特性)
entry.def: If you tend towards a particular characteristic, you often display that characteristic.

example.ex: Artistic and intellectual people tend towards left-wing views.
example.tran: 搞艺术的人和知识分子容易持“左倾”观点。

entry.def: You can say that you tend to think something when you want to give your opinion, but do not want it to seem too forceful or definite.

example.ex: I tend to think that members of parliament by and large do a good job.
example.tran: 我个人觉得，议会议员总体上工作还是不错的。

entry.def: If you tend someone or something, you do what is necessary to keep them in a good condition or to improve their condition.

example.ex: For years he tended her in her painful illness...
example.tran: 多年来她一直受到病痛的折磨，都是他在照料。

example.ex: He tends the flower beds and evergreens that he has planted in the driveway.
example.tran: 他打理着他栽在车道两旁的花坛和常青树。

entry.def: If you tend to someone or something, you pay attention to them and deal with their problems and needs.

example.ex: In our culture, girls are brought up to tend to the needs of others...
example.tran: 在我们的文化里，女孩从小就学着照料别人。

example.ex: She hurried away to pour more coffee and tend to the grill.
example.tran: 她匆忙走开，去添加咖啡和照看烤架。

means.word_mean: 1. have a tendency or disposition to do or be something; be inclined;

sentences.sentence: "She tends to be nervous before her lectures"

means.word_mean: 2. have care of or look after;

auth_sentence.content: They tend to be the days for bumper audiences.
auth_sentence.res_content: They tend to be the days for bumper audiences.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They tend to be the days for bumper audiences.

auth_sentence.content: You tend to forget just how hard it is.
auth_sentence.res_content: You tend to forget just how hard it is.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You tend to forget just how hard it is.

auth_sentence.content: His own albums tend to be overlooked by comparison.
auth_sentence.res_content: His own albums tend to be overlooked by comparison.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His own albums tend to be overlooked by comparison.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图

stems_affixes.value_cn: 嫩的, 温柔的, 软弱的
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向+er→像伸出的幼芽→嫩的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
stems_affixes.word_buile: attend[v.出席,参加]+ance表名词→n.出席, 出席的人数, 伺候, 照料
attend[v.出席,参加]+ant人→n.服务员;随从,随员
intend[v.想要,打算,企图]+ed……的→adj.有意的, 故意的, 已经订婚的 n.已经订婚者
intend[[v.想要,打算,企图]]拿省鷄dj.目不转睛的,热切的 n.意图
tend趋向+ency表名词→n.趋势,趋向;倾向
at加强+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→出席
con一起+tend伸展,趋向→一起伸展→竞争,斗争

stems_affixes.value_cn: 延长,延伸;扩充;给予;提供;估价
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+tend伸展,趋向→伸出去→扩张
in内+tend伸展,趋向→内心伸出→想要

stems_affixes.value_cn: 假装,假托,借口,[在演戏中]装扮
stems_affixes.word_buile: pre预先,提前+tend伸展,趋向→提前展开,事先展开→假装,借口
pro前+tend伸展,趋向→v.[使]伸出, [使]伸展

stems_affixes.value_cn: 趋向,往往是;易于,往往会;照料,看护
stems_affixes.word_buile: tend伸展,趋向→趋向做→易于,往往会

abbreviation.mean_cn: 柔嫩的，触痛的，敏感的, 触痛，敏感

Sentence.sentence: They tend to be slow in confronting new challenges.
they tend to exaggerate each other's positive qualities
romantic love tends to yield where family or social pressures are strong

means.word_mean: 照料, 照顾, 伺候

sentences.en: She tended her husband carefully during his illness.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫生病期间, 她无微不至地照顾他。

sentences.en: My grandmother tends to go to bed early every day.
sentences.cn: 我祖母每天通常比较早睡。

jushi.english: At junction take the road that tends west.
jushi.chinese: 到交叉路口时,走朝西的那条路。
